eu.opends.hmi

Class RedTrafficLightPresentationModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.opends.hmi.PresentationModel
      • eu.opends.hmi.RedTrafficLightPresentationModel

  • public class RedTrafficLightPresentationModel
extends PresentationModel
    This class represents the presentation of a red traffic light warning. The distance between the moving car and a red traffic light is measured in order to estimate the duration of the presentation.
    Author:
    Rafael Math

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class eu.opends.hmi.PresentationModel

        car, currentRoundedDist, minimumDistance, precisionFactor, previousRoundedDist, targetPosition

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RedTrafficLightPresentationModel(Car car, TrafficLight trafficLight)
      Initializes a red traffic light presentation model by setting the positions of the car and traffic light, the minimum distance from the traffic light to cancel the presentation and the traffic light object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long createPresentation()
      Creates a red traffic light presentation task on the SIM-TD HMI GUI.
      java.lang.String generateMessage()
      Generates a message containing the red traffic light warning and distance to it.
      boolean stopPresentation()
      Condition to stop presentation.
      void updatePresentation(long presentationID)
      Updates a red traffic light warning presentation model if the time the car takes to arrive at the traffic light has changed.

      • Methods inherited from class eu.opends.hmi.PresentationModel

        computeCurrentParameters, computePreviousParameters, getExactDistanceToTarget, getRoundedDistanceToTarget, getTimeToTarget, hasChangedParameter, setCar, shiftCurrentToPreviousParameters

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RedTrafficLightPresentationModel

        public RedTrafficLightPresentationModel(Car car,
                                TrafficLight trafficLight)
        Initializes a red traffic light presentation model by setting the positions of the car and traffic light, the minimum distance from the traffic light to cancel the presentation and the traffic light object.
        Parameters:
        car - Car heading towards the traffic light
        trafficLight - Traffic light object

    • Method Detail

      • stopPresentation

        public boolean stopPresentation()
        Condition to stop presentation. Returns true, if approximation of the car is less than the given minimum distance, if the car is driving backwards or if the traffic light state is no longer red.
        Overrides:
        stopPresentation in class PresentationModel
        Returns:
        True, if stop condition holds

      • createPresentation

        public long createPresentation()
        Creates a red traffic light presentation task on the SIM-TD HMI GUI. This data will only be sent to the HMI bundle once.
        Specified by:
        createPresentation in class PresentationModel
        Returns:
        Presentation ID. If an error occurred, a negative value will be returned.

      • updatePresentation

        public void updatePresentation(long presentationID)
        Updates a red traffic light warning presentation model if the time the car takes to arrive at the traffic light has changed.
        Specified by:
        updatePresentation in class PresentationModel

      • generateMessage

        public java.lang.String generateMessage()
        Generates a message containing the red traffic light warning and distance to it.
        Specified by:
        generateMessage in class PresentationModel
